attributes.additional_details: If the e-petition gets enough signatures I want the government to make a race circuit in Cornwall for all types of racing including; motorbikes, sidecars, lorries, supercars etc. Cornwall has no racing facilities for these types of motorsports. By signing this petition you will be helping to make these sports well-known and easily accessible for the residents of Cornwall, and also for the people who have such passion for these sports who have to travel a great distance to achieve their dreams.

rejection.details: This is one for the Local Authorities to consider.
